Token.Abstract: Provides support for basing an object's description method on the MBFieldListFormatter, for giving objects a way to create more legible console log output.
Asks the receiver to add any relevant fields to the passed-in MBFieldListFormatter instance.

Parameter.Name: fmt
Parameter.Abstract: The formatter to which description fields should be added.

Token.Abstract: Implemented by subclasses that wish to provide an additional means of identifying an object instance within the debug console.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If a non-nil value is returned by this method, a field named "debugDescriptor" will be added to the consoleDescription.

Token.Abstract: Uses an MBFieldListFormatter instance in conjunction with the addDescriptionFieldsTo: method to construct a description of the receiver intended for output to the console.
Writes the output of the receiver's consoleDescription method to the console log.
Overrides the NSObject implementation to return the output of consoleDescription.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The return value of calling the consoleDescription
